page.title: 07LEISURE TIME IN BROMSGROVE-1
page.content: {CUBS AND SCOUTS}- The cub and scout hall is next to Sanders Park. A cub pack is organised in sixes, with a leader called a sixer. Each six has a different coloured tie bobble. In cubs you play all kinds of games. You also make things, like candles, and try to get badges, for example, a music badge by playing an instrument. Cubs also parade in Sanders Park and in the carnival. {GUIDES AND BROWNIES}- On a Friday I go to Guides. It starts at 6.30pm and finishes at 8.30pm. You can start at ten years old and finish at thirteen. You learn all about Lord and Lady Baden Powell. If you are seven you can go to Brownies. We go to the guide hut on the Kidderminster road. Guides wear a blue skirt and a burgundy tie. Brown -ies wear a brown dress and a yellow tie.
